name: This website
description: Repository holding this website's code. Pages were made to be independent from the data displayed on them. WIP

name: Arch Quick Setup
description: Some scripts and files to make setting up arch on a fresh install just the way I like like it simple and easy, with just a few simple strokes and key presses. Constant WIP.

name: NCGM's Website
description: Website of the Nucleus of Computer Graphics and Multimedia (NCGM)

name: [] Invaders
description: Repository for MIEIC's LCOM class of the year 2021/2022. Contains the lab assignments and my final project project for the class,a clone of the classic Space Invaders.

name: SRT Editor
description: Simple srt file editing tool created to aid me in my manual modification (and occasional creation) of subtitle files.

name: NCGM Learning Project
description: My learning project developed for NCGM. A simple text based adventure about escaping a locked room.

name: Cleaning Day
description: Game developed for the 2022 edition of the Level-Up Game Jam.

name: Tap(e) It
description: Game developed for the 2020 edition of the Global Game Jam.
